analyzed: om namaḥ sūrya kalā jāla kāla deha apahāriṇe
ādhāra ādheya pīṭhāya bhavāya abhava dāyine
namaḥ śiśu niśā kānta kalā kamala māline
paramānanda dehāya śivāya avyakta mūrtaye
namaḥ pāśa ogha saṃghaṭṭa laya viśleṣa kāriṇe
mantra garbha udara sthāya harāya paramātmane

original: yadyapi tvaṃ guṇātīto vākpater apy agocaraḥ /
analyzed: yadi api tvam guṇa atītaḥ vākpateḥ api agocaraḥ

original: tathāpy ā hṛdayāt stotum udyatā vāk sadā mama // CakBhst_4 //
analyzed: tathā api ā hṛdayāt stotum udyatā vāc sadā mama
ati bhakti rasa āveśa vivaśā viśvatomukha

original: tvatpreritā yato nātha nāparādho 'sti me kvacit // CakBhst_5 //
analyzed: tvad preritāḥ yatas nātha na aparādhaḥ sti me kvacid
tvad pāda abja rajaḥ pūta citābhūti vibhūṣitāt
gṛhāṇa mattaḥ śrīkaṇṭha
bhāva pūjām akṛtrimām
hṛdpuṣkara ākhye snātvā antar tīrthe yogi niṣevite
saṃbodha dhauta vasanaḥ śyāma kaṇṭham yajāmi aham
prabhūta bhūta saṃbhūta śoṇitaiḥ argha bhājanam
kriyate te mahākāla kāya kaṃkāla kandale
yat yat vikalpanā jālam bāhya artha pratipattaye

original: tat tad dvārādhipakulaṃ tava pūjyaṃ manasvibhiḥ // CakBhst_9 //
analyzed: tat tat dvārādhipa kulam tava pūjyam manasvibhiḥ
pūjyase nagajā kānta
grahaṇe candra sūryayoḥ
hāna ādāna udaya ārambha sat asat vibhrama ujjhitam
jñapti mātra pratiṣṭhānam āsanam trijagatpate
mūrti dānam an ābhāsa śakti bhāsa upabṛṃhitam
turyapīṭha pratiṣṭhānam vitarāmi jagatpate
diś kāla deśa kalanā kalaṅka ujjhita cetasaḥ

original: kaḥ karoti budhaḥ sthāṇor āhvānādivisarjanam // CakBhst_13 //
analyzed: kaḥ karoti budhaḥ sthāṇoḥ āhvāna ādi visarjanam
sūrya śītāṃu netrābhyām mathitvā śakti vāridhim
para amṛta rasa abhyaṅgam śivāya vinivedaye
indriyeṣu indriya artheṣu rāga lobha anuyāyiṣu

original: niḥsnehatvaṃ prabhutvaṃ ca rūkṣam udvartanaṃ tava // CakBhst_15 //
analyzed: niḥsneha tvam prabhu tvam ca rūkṣam udvartanam tava
saṃśodhya anacchakalayā baindhavam tīrtham añjasā
sva prabodha ambara udāra vikasat vastra gharṣaṇam
viniveśya bhavat saṃvid vikārān vikarāmahe
jñāna jñeya parityāga naga nirjhara visrutam

original: paramānandadaṃ me 'ntas tava pādyam anābilam // CakBhst_18 //
analyzed: parama ānanda dam me ntar tava pādyam anābilam
galat kaivalya salilam ādatsva ācamanam vibho
prakṣālya dhāraṇa ambhobhiḥ granthi pañcaka mauktikam

original: anarghyam arghaṃ pādebhyaḥ prayacchāmi vṛṣākape // CakBhst_20 //
analyzed: anarghyam argham pādebhyaḥ prayacchāmi vṛṣākape

original: girīśa tisṛbhir vāgbhiḥ stutipuṣpaiḥ prapūjyase // CakBhst_21 //
analyzed: girīśa tisṛbhiḥ vāgbhiḥ stuti puṣpaiḥ prapūjyase
prāṇa vahni śikhā astreṇa bhaṅktvā brahmabilam lasat
dhūpa varti nibha ābhāsaḥ dhūpaḥ te nagajādhava

original: anāhatā nadaty antar yā gaur dhāmni pare parā /
analyzed: an āhatā nadati antar yā gauḥ dhāmni pare parā

original: sā ghaṇṭā vādyate śambhor agre granthārthagarbhiṇī // CakBhst_23 //
analyzed: sā ghaṇṭā vādyate śambhoḥ agre grantha artha garbhiṇī
kanda anala ullasat śakti śikhām dīpa śikhā upamām
uddīpayāmi bhagavat moha dhvānta apanuttaye
vṛtti tyāga amṛta kalā candraḥ candra kirīṭinaḥ
samālambhana vevā astu mumukṣūṇām vimuktaye
nāda śakti uditam dhāma mala traya vivarjitam

original: uṣṇīṣam astu te rudra vidrāvitanabho 'rgalam // CakBhst_26 //
analyzed: uṣṇīṣam astu te rudra vidrāvita nabhaḥ ṛgalam
bhavat bhakti sudhā sāra saṃplāvita hṛd ambudheḥ
prollasat brahma kamalam amalam te stu śekharam
bodha aravinda saṃdohaḥ hara hāra latā tava

original: nityoditāntaravyāpti- kalā candrakalā ca te // CakBhst_28 //
analyzed: nitya udita antara vyāpti kalā candra kalā ca te
ākṛṣya arka karaiḥ śāktaiḥ viśva ākāśa kuśeśayāt

original: mantraṃ manasi tacchaktau tāṃ svadhāmni sadodite /
analyzed: mantram manasi tad śaktau tām sva dhāmni sadā udite

original: kṛtvā japavidhiṃ samyak śivāya vinivedaye // CakBhst_30 //
analyzed: kṛtvā japa vidhim samyak śivāya vinivedaye
niḥśeṣa artha parityāge grahaṇe vā amitāt dyute

original: anābilaṃ parāṃ vyāptiṃ mudrāṃ badhnāmi dhūrjaṭe // CakBhst_31 //
analyzed: anābilam parām vyāptim mudrām badhnāmi dhūrjaṭe
śaṣkulī karṇayoḥ baddhvā yaḥ vijṛmbhate

original: tadgītam atha te vādyam ādyasaṃpuṭaghaṭṭanāt // CakBhst_32 //
analyzed: tat gītam atha te vādyam ādya saṃpuṭa ghaṭṭanāt
bhavat bhāva rasa āveśāt tāṇḍava āḍambara uddhataḥ

original: mantrādhvani nadāmy antaḥ kim u bāhyārthabhāvanaiḥ // CakBhst_33 //
analyzed: mantra adhvani nadāmi antar kim bāhya artha bhāvanaiḥ

original: upariṣṭān mayā śambhor vitānam upakalpitam // CakBhst_34 //
analyzed: upariṣṭāt mayā śambhoḥ vitānam upakalpitam
recayitvā karandhreṇa bhā cakram hṛdaya ambarāt

original: dhāryate dhūrjaṭer agre cārucāmaravan mayā // CakBhst_35 //
analyzed: dhāryate dhūrjaṭeḥ agre cāru cāmara vat mayā
visṛtaiḥ prasṛtaiḥ puras

original: tālavṛntair iva vibho vījyase haṃsamārutaiḥ // CakBhst_36 //
analyzed: tālavṛntaiḥ iva vibho vījyase haṃsa mārutaiḥ
sarva ātapa vinirmuktam bhavat bhakti sudhā sitam

original: ātapatram athāsmābhir dhāryate te mahāśaya // CakBhst_37 //
analyzed: ātapatram atha asmābhiḥ dhāryate te mahā āśaya
ahaṃkāra turaṅgaḥ te vāhanāya prakalpitaḥ
sphurat spanda indu surabhi tāmbūlam te nivedyate
bhogya bhoktṛ vibheda uttha vāsanā indhana saṃcayam

original: advaitāgnau juhomy antaḥ śāṃkare sreyasām nidhau // CakBhst_40 //
analyzed: advaita agnau juhomi antar śāṃkare sreyasām nidhau
prakāśa ākāśa hastābhyām avalambya unmanā srucam

original: dharmādharmagalatsneha- pūrṇāṃ vahnau juhomy aje // CakBhst_41 //
analyzed: dharma adharma galat sneha pūrṇām vahnau juhomi aje
yuṣmad dhyāna niśānātha kiraṇaiḥ uparañjitaḥ
antar māna vidhau te stu citta cintāmaṇiḥ mama
mokṣa lakṣmī kara ambhoja pātre vinyasya saṃskṛtām
nivedayāmi bhagavan prāṇa sarvasva dakṣiṇām
saṃsāra vāridheḥ santaḥ param pāram titīrṣavaḥ
candramauleḥ śrayantu uccais bhāva pūjā taraṇḍakam
ittham īśāna caraṇa nuteḥ yat samupārjitam

original: śreyas tena jagat kṛtsnaṃ dveṣadoṣād vimucyatām // CakBhst_45 //
analyzed: śreyaḥ tena jagat kṛtsnam dveṣa doṣāt vimucyatām
stotram gṛhāṇa parameśvara viśva sākṣin māna avamāna mata ujjhita cittavṛtteḥ
mattaḥ tvad aṅghri yuga pīṭha nilīna mauleḥ bhasma avaguṇṭhita tanoḥ nṛ kapāla pāṇeḥ
mahāpāśupata udyāne kaścid viśramya tāpasaḥ

original: cakre ciccakranāthasya śambhor bhāvanutiṃ parām // CakBhst_47 //
analyzed: cakre cit cakra nāthasya śambhoḥ bhāva nutim parām
